channel.title: [NEWLY REVIEALED] runescape 3 "Beta" Picture's Discussion
channel.description:
Well i heard alot of talk about runescape 3 in forums (and actually jagex is [b]NOT[/b] saying there is no RUNESCAPE 3. Nor are they comferming there will be runescape 3 but i came across these photo's of runescape 3 what its what it may look like opening day "This is not Conferming rs3 is real" Th
ps:this is not mine...its from another forum [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img67.imageshack.us/img67/9740/rs3withinterfacezj5uh9.png[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-08-05
Pics COntinue
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img67.imageshack.us/img67/5531/runescape3pw6.png[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-08-05
Will Runescape 3 ever come out?
The answer is "quite possibly". Unfortunately, only Jagex can answer this question fully and completely, however I'll explain my reason for thinking that it will come out some day.
In business, every product (e.g. runescape.com) needs to develop and evolve over time to increase and extend the products life cycle, or retaining the creator's customer base, or even increase it (Hopefully).
If runescape stays exactly how it is, I guarantee that people will get bored of it. I'm sure that the current version of runescape will always exist (Take the original runescape classic for example). However, I believe that in the future there will be a fully functional, high end resolution version of runescape 3 with extremely high detail.
With this comes higher bandwidth usage and higher costs, so membership fees would likely increase a bit, but it would be well worth it.

item.dc:creator: @philiplg philiplg
item.description:
@philiplg wrote:

= better
= way better

[quote=“Chimaera God, post:60, topic:130608”]Jagex would never make a RuneScape3; do any of you know why??? I know why. Jagex won’t make RuneScape3 mainly becuase of the people who already have member accounts on RS2. Making a new RS would mean that everybody who has a decent or high leveled account would have abandon it so they could play RS3. This would only happen if Jagex decided to ditch the RS2 program and start working on RS3, which would make the millions upon millions of players who already play RS2.

Anybody have a response???[/quote]

not really… since the database is kept they could copy the accounts table over… yes there are probably different tables for different things of the characters for example there could a player and its id is 1 then if it had items the items could be stored on a different database called items and a column could identify what account id they are in, so they could just copy over account that way you get you account just not skills(if they are in a different table) or they could copy the skills and the account table over you get your skills. Or more copy your accounts, stats and items tables so you get your items on your account with your skills, if this makes no sense i can post a image of what i mean.

Read full topic

item.title: [NEWLY REVIEALED] runescape 3 "Beta" Picture's Discussion
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

exe626:

Ancient Magicks is something RuneHQ thought was cool, so they had to be gay and write that.

not true… well, i am not sure actually. But in the knowledge base on the runescape official forums i have definatly seen jagex use the word “magicks”. I agree it sounds stupid.#

oh heres a quote from the knowledge base

Magic - The Ancient Magicks Desert Treasure - Unlock the Ancient Magicks

Upon completing this quest you will gain access to the Ancient Magicks spell list. Unlike other spells, which you are able to unlock as your Magic level advances, these spells require you to change your entire spell list (or ‘book’) by travelling to Jaldraocht Pyramid and praying at a special altar. To change back to the original spellbook, pray at the altar again.

just type “magick” into the KB search.

Read full topic

item.title: [NEWLY REVIEALED] runescape 3 "Beta" Picture's Discussion
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:61, topic:130608”][quote author=Chimaera God link=topic=181268.msg1668112#msg1668112 date=1186892681]
Jagex would never make a RuneScape3; do any of you know why??? I know why. Jagex won’t make RuneScape3 mainly becuase of the people who already have member accounts on RS2. Making a new RS would mean that everybody who has a decent or high leveled account would have abandon it so they could play RS3. This would only happen if Jagex decided to ditch the RS2 program and start working on RS3, which would make the millions upon millions of players who already play RS2.

Anybody have a response???
[/quote]

Yeah, you’re a fag who thinks he knows it all.

People were members on RSC when they made RS2… People went from playing RSc to playing RS2. If it happened before, with people switching from the game they plaed (e.g. From RSC to RS2), then why wouldn’t it happen again?

Also your last line doesn’t make sense:

This would only happen if Jagex decided to ditch the RS2 program and start working on RS3, which would make the millions upon millions of players who already play RS2.

Explain please?[/quote]

Jagex isn’t stupid, they gave people when RS2 came out the decision to choose either RS2 or stay in RSC. I wouldn’t see why they couldn’t easily transfer it over.

Honestly though… why would you want to play another Runescape? They use shitty graphics because of the people that want to play a game, but can’t afford a nice computer or an internet connection. So I figure RS2 will be out a lot longer now, and hell you can kick off the “2” because frankly that is Runescape now; it will be like that for a long time.

Read full topic
